meanings: (S) anyway, (S) anyhow, (S) at any rate, in any case, at all events

vlive.korean: 그리고 어쨌든 약간 좀... And, anyhow, a little... 듣기 View video BTS : 꿀FM <지진정의 R.A.D.I.O 라디오> #중대발표
다 자른 건 아니지만 어쨌든 한... Not all but... 듣기 View video TWICE : 심야브이 샤라디오
안 돼 - 어쨌든 콘서트 준비하면서 뭘 찍었는... - 안돼! No. - While preparing for concert... - No! 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 🌙
vlive.english: No. - While preparing for concert... - No!

vlive.korean: [어쨌든 달달한 두 사람] 아몬드 초콜릿 괜찮은데? [Both of them are sweet] Almond chocolate! That's nice. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Two Kids Song(투키즈송)] Ep.03
vlive.english: [Both of them are sweet] Almond chocolate! That's nice.

vlive.korean: 어쨌든 솔로로 선보이는 자리는 처음인 거 맞죠? but either way, this is the first time you're coming out as a soloist, right? 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : [full] WOODZ 1ST MINI ALBUM [EQUAL] SHOWCASE
vlive.english: but either way, this is the first time you're coming out as a soloist, right?

examples.korean: I may be away on business next week but at any rate I’ll be back by Friday. 발음듣기 내가 다음 주에는 출장을 갈지도 몰라. 하지만 어쨌든 금요일까지는 돌아올 걸세. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I may be away on business next week but at any rate I’ll be back by Friday. 발음

examples.korean: It’ll cost a lot—well, take a lot of time, but it amounts to the same thing. 발음듣기 그것은 경비가 많이 들 것이고, 아니 시간이 많이 걸릴 것인데 어쨌든 그건 마찬가지이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’ll cost a lot—well, take a lot of time, but it amounts to the same thing. 발음

examples.korean: Oh, bugger the cost! Let’s get it anyway. 발음듣기 에이, 값은 모르겠어! 어쨌든 그걸 사자. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Oh, bugger the cost! Let’s get it anyway. 발음

examples.korean: Well, that’s one good piece of news at any rate. 발음듣기 글쎄, 어쨌든 그건 좋은 소식이군. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Well, that’s one good piece of news at any rate. 발음

examples.korean: He should have paid. He suggested it, after all. 발음듣기 그가 돈을 냈어야지. 어쨌든 그가 제안을 한 거니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He should have paid. He suggested it, after all. 발음
